page.title: 09Leisure Survey in Nuthall
page.content: We have done a survey to try and find out about peoples favourite spare time activities. We questioned 100 people in the{25 to 40}age group. We gave them a sheet with a list of questions and asked them to choose their top three activities. The men voted for{playing sport}as their top choice. They said they did it to help keep fit, to meet people and for the competition. The men's second choice was watching sport, and the third was watching T.V. The ladies first choice was{reading, then came listening to music and third came watching T.V. They chose reading because it was something they could do at any time, anywhere and because they found it relaxing.
